column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////It's been tough to find my "go-to bakery" spot in this city but the search is finally over! This place is devine! The cakes are not only beautiful
column2: but they taste fabulous which is very uncommon. Those who have a sweet tooth know what I'm talking about. So far I've tried 3 of their cakes
column3: their macaroons and chocolate chip cookie! All fantastic!
